overview.tax_residency_rules: Determined by days spent in country within a tax year.
overview.currency_exchange_rules: Exchange controls in place to limit capital outflows.

personal_income_tax.foreign_income_taxed: Yes, but with potential for a foreign tax credit.
personal_income_tax.exemptions: Some social benefits and housing allowances are exempt.
personal_income_tax.social_security: 10% of salary, capped at 34 MKT for 2023 (1 MKT = 3,450 KZT).

corporate_tax.rate: 15% on net profits (10% for small businesses).
corporate_tax.small_business_rate: 10% for businesses with revenue below 200 million KZT.
corporate_tax.foreign_income_taxed: Yes, with potential for a foreign tax credit.
corporate_tax.deductions: R&D expenses, depreciation, certain business expenses.

capital_gains_tax.rate: 15% on gains from the sale of capital assets.
capital_gains_tax.exemptions: Gains from the sale of primary residence are exempt.

vat_gst.reduced_rate: 8% on certain food items and periodicals.

property_tax.rate: 1% of assessed value for residential property, 0.5% for commercial property.
property_tax.exemptions: Property used for agricultural purposes is exempt.

double_taxation_agreements.description: Avoids double taxation on income and capital gains.

additional_notes.economic_stability: Kazakhstan has a relatively stable economy.
additional_notes.legal_system: The legal system is based on civil law.
additional_notes.ease_of_doing_business: Ranked 25th in the World Bank's Ease of Doing Business Index.
